name: Hobos
tagline: An API to retrieve Hobo names and illustrations of said hobos
body:
# Hobos!
A simple utility that gives you a random hobo name.

```BASH
git clone https://www.github.com/rhgraysonii/hobos.git
cd hobos
gem build hobos.gemspec
gem install hobos-0.0.1.gem
cd ..
```

And now, random hobos, or find hobo by hobo id.

```BASH
hobos
#=> random_hobo_name
hobos 1
#=> Stewbuilder Dennis
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
